title: Kylie Jenner dresses daughter Stormi in glamorous Met Gala look for Halloween
text:
CLOSE Cosmetics mogul Kylie Jenner is cashing in on a sweet "mom moment" that went viral. USA TODAY

Most daughters dressing up as their mothers may look a little, well, less glamorous. And probably a little more tired.

But Stormi Webster's mom is Kylie Jenner.

The model and cosmetics guru posted pictures to social media Sunday of her daughter dressed up as none other than herself, Kylie Jenner, in what we can only guess is the 1-year-old's Halloween costume.

The toddler's look? A miniature version of the feathered purple gown by Versace that Jenner wore to the 2019 Met Gala.

Jenner captioned the post, "My baby!!!!!!!! I cant handle this!!!!" and added several purple heart emojis.

No word on whether the toddler's gown is Versace, but it appears to be a close replica (yet smaller), so we can only imagine how much it cost.

Kylie Jenner arrives for the 2019 Met Gala at the Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 6, 2019, in New York. (Photo: ANGELA WEISS, AFP/Getty Images)

Riiiise and shiiine: Kylie Jenner singing 'Rise and Shine' in an epic mom voice has taken the internet by storm

Need a costume? Easy and oh-so-adorable last-minute Halloween costumes for kids and babies

Many commented on Jenner's post with words of cuteness overload, including dad Travis Scott, who left a simple heart emoji.

"She won," wrote one fan. "Ohh I love it! She's adorable," wrote another.

Others were a little more critical of the idea.

"What level of narcissism do you have to be on to dress your kid as yourself for Halloween," wrote one on Twitter.

"Kylie really dressed up Stormi as herself," another shared to Twitter which was later retweeted by someone else with "Kylie a narcissist for sure."

What level of narcissism do you have to be on to dress your kid as yourself for Halloween I'm- pic.twitter.com/NfvOeDrUAS — natalie grim reaper 💀 (@natalieegrim) October 28, 2019

Tiny Jenner does look a adorable, but it's certainly a far cry from the sweatpants and messy buns most babies would be rocking if they dressed up as their mamas.

In other mom-daughter twinning news, Gabrielle Union also dressed her almost 1-year-old daughter Kaavia as herself for Halloween, rocking matching "Clover" cheerleading uniforms. Their sweet look is from the 2000 movie hit "Bring It On," in which Union starred as cheerleading team caption Isis.

Follow the latest from USA TODAY Parenting at usatoday.com/life/parenting.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/life/parenting/2019/10/28/kylie-jenner-purple-met-gala-look-daughter-stormi-halloween-costume/2483517001/
description: Kylie Jenner posted photos to social media of her daughter Stormi Webster wearing a mini replica of her 2019 Met Gala dress. Cute or narcissistic?
